rules.fullName: Updates Care Status To Waiting If Key Fields Change
rules.description: Sends updated Contact to CARE if key field(s) changes
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Care_Status__c, "Waiting")), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Clients", OR( ISCHANGED(Branch__c), ISCHANGED(MailingPostalCode), ISCHANGED(MailingCountry), ISCHANGED(MailingCity), ISCHANGED(MailingStreet), ISCHANGED(Email), ISCHANGED(Phone), ISCHANGED(HomePhone), ISCHANGED(MobilePhone) ) )
